original_title: Maten a ese hijo de la chingada
overview: Commander Lara has been assigned with a dangerous mission: Bring a witness before the Court, where he will testify against a senior government official, who is accused of corruption. Even at the cost of his own life Commander Lara will perform the task entrusted to him, confronting a crowd of gunmen willing to eliminate him and in his dizzying race to the court he will have to deal with his own friends at the police department, as many guardians of the law have now been sold to the corrupt official, betraying the corporation and its principles. An explosive mission that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
title: Explosive Mission
